channel.title: I have a question
channel.description:
does anybody know of any upload managers
like when your uploading your files for example you can pause stop resume cancel
because i have file i want to upload liek my client
but its a big file and when i try to upload them they take for ever and before they get done my internet shuts off because i dont host a server i only code stuff and have other people host for me but i want to upload my client i just got done making and stuff and its kinda bug and i cant upload it because the internet shuts off

item.title: I have a question
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

I don’t think it’s much difference.

Read full topic

item.title: I have a question
item.dc:creator: @booster booster
item.description:
@booster wrote:

im going to try uploading on a premium membership and see how much faster that would be

Read full topic

item.title: I have a question
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Sending the file is basically a direct upload/download, it will still be the same.

Read full topic

item.title: I have a question
item.dc:creator: @booster booster
item.description:
@booster wrote:

k another quest is there a way i can send the file to someone else and they upload them for me ? because that will also help alot ?

Read full topic

item.title: I have a question
item.dc:creator: @Bmaw Bmaw
item.description:
@Bmaw wrote:

Ohh that would be why.

Read full topic

item.title: I have a question
item.dc:creator: @booster booster
item.description:
@booster wrote:

well atm i use dial-up because i cant get high speed were i am and i looked into getting satelite but satelite internet sucks at gaming stuff like this online

Read full topic

item.title: I have a question
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

[quote=“booster, post:6, topic:289064”][quote author=Bmaw link=topic=382153.msg2870519#msg2870519 date=1247729617]
How is it that big that your internet shuts off.

Average it should be 20-30kb MAX
[/quote]

what do you mean the upload speed?
well it is but after a while it drops and stuff it sucks[/quote]Same here… -.-
Mine shuts off atleast 2-3 times a day. lol

Read full topic

item.title: I have a question
item.dc:creator: @booster booster
item.description:
@booster wrote:

[quote=“Bmaw, post:5, topic:289064”]How is it that big that your internet shuts off.

Average it should be 20-30kb MAX[/quote]

what do you mean the upload speed?
well it is but after a while it drops and stuff it sucks

Read full topic

item.title: I have a question
item.dc:creator: @Bmaw Bmaw
item.description:
@Bmaw wrote:

How is it that big that your internet shuts off.

Average it should be 20-30kb MAX

Read full topic

item.title: I have a question
item.dc:creator: @booster booster
item.description:
@booster wrote:

because i know the download managers work that way but idk

Read full topic

item.title: I have a question
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Mediafire should be the best one, though I’m not sure if the uploading can continue if the internet shuts off and then is turned back on and resumed.

Read full topic

item.title: I have a question
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

If the internet shuts off I don’t think there is a way to continue uploading again even if you paused.

Read full topic
